name: The Dark Phantom: Dawn of Darkness
storyline:
The game offers a compelling dark story with several unique Antagonists in a fictional modern city full of criminals and villains. The dark tone of the game is enhanced by the dark and comic style art and spectacular and special effects achieved by UDK engine.

When the criminals are running from justice and turning the world into a worthless place, a man of night rises against them from deep down of shadows. He is The Dark Phantom, angel of night and voice of justice. He has unwillingly entered a future vague adventure.

A hero, who turns to criminal’s nightmare to find his dark foretime.

After having a strange incident, the Dark Phantom has lost his memory. Without remembering anything from his past, he enters a very dangerous game. Drug gans are controlling the whole city and police operations to catch them have been useless so far.
summary:
The Dark Phantom is a 3D third person shooter powered by UDK technology with emphasis on covering and dynamic gun fights. The player will play in the role of Shabgard, a man robbed of his past, seeking light in the darkness.

The game features advanced A.I. that not only take advantage of covers but also work cooperatively to force player out of cover to make the gameplay dynamic and keep player on his toes.
